etymology.description: Phonetic: 雚(雚) (guàn, "stork") + Semantic: 鳥(鳥) (niǎo, "bird") = representation of a stork
etymology.interpretation: The character 鸛(鸛) (guàn, "stork") combines the phonetic 雚(雚) (guàn, "stork") and the semantic 鳥(鳥) (niǎo, "bird") to emphasize the birdlike nature of a stork. The dual reference to storks in the phonetic and semantic elements highlights its specific meaning.
etymology.simplification: Simplification retains the phonetic original 雚(雚) (guàn, "stork") while reducing 鳥(鳥) (niǎo, "bird") to its simplified form 鸟(鸟) (niǎo, "bird").
